question: Which paper proposes the two-stage training method, i.e., task-specific fine-tuning and cross-domain pre-training, to train an open-domain dialogue evaluator using the self-collected dataset.
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Which paper proposes the two-stage training method, i.e., task-specific fine-tuning and cross-domain pre-training, to train an open-domain dialogue evaluator using the self-collected dataset.
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: RADE: Reference-Assisted Dialogue Evaluation for Open-Domain Dialogue
